-- == Nested interrupt ==
-- interrupt handler able to accept interrupt in itself code (nesting interrupts)

0 => "1001000000000001",	-- LI R1, 128
1 => "1110000000001000",	-- JWL R0, R1

4 => "0111111000001010",	-- CTR R2, SIP
5 => "0001111111111111",	-- ADD R7, R7, -1
6 => "0011100000111010",	-- ST R2, R7, 0
7 => "0111110000000000",	-- RTC R0, MSR
8 => "0110000000000000",	-- OR R0, R0, R0
9 => "0110000000000000",	-- OR R0, R0, R0
10 => "0001100001001001",	-- ADD R1, R1, 1
11 => "0110000000000000",	-- OR R0, R0, R0
12 => "0110000000000000",	-- OR R0, R0, R0
13 => "0111110101000000",	-- RTC R5, MSR
14 => "0010100000111010",	-- LD R2, R7, 0
15 => "0001100001111111",	-- ADD R7, R7, 1
16 => "1110000000010000",	-- JWL R0, R2

128 => "1000000000100101",	-- LI R5, 1
129 => "1001111111100110",	-- LI R6, 255
130 => "1001111111100111",	-- LI R7, 255
131 => "1001010000000001",	-- LI R1, 160
132 => "0111110000000000",	-- RTC R0, MSR
133 => "0110000000000000",	-- OR R0, R0, R0
134 => "0110000000000000",	-- OR R0, R0, R0
135 => "0110000000000000",	-- OR R0, R0, R0
136 => "0110000000000000",	-- OR R0, R0, R0
137 => "0111110101000000",	-- RTC R5, MSR
138 => "1110000000001000",	-- JWL R0, R1

160 => "1110000000000000", -- JWL R0, R0
161 => "1110000000000000", -- JWL R0, R0
162 => "1110000000000000", -- JWL R0, R0
163 => "1110000000000000", -- JWL R0, R0
